name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cake Sundae
instructions: 1. Place a slice of pineapple upside-down cake on a serving dish.
2. Place a scoop of vanilla ice cream on top of the cake.
3. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream.
4. Finish by adding a maraschino cherry on top.
description: The Pineapple Upside-Down Cake Sundae is a delightful dessert that combines the classic flavors of pineapple upside-down cake with the creamy indulgence of vanilla ice cream. It's a perfect treat for those who enjoy the sweet and tangy taste of pineapples.
